member.name: T:RoomService.Models.Reservation.Statuses
member.summary:
Reservation status of users
Attiva when the start-time is before the current time and whose end-time is after the current time In-Corso when the reservation is in force Conclusa ended when checkout is done Checkin when the user uses the booked service Cancellata when the user cancels his reservation
